Header: Youth drowns and goes missing during a sea bath in Wattala
Content: A youth that went for a sea bath has drowned in the Wattala - Prithipura sea and has gone missing. The police said that the accident had occurred while he had gone for a sea bath with group of people last evening. The victim is a 25-year-old resident of the Sedawatta area in Wellampitiya. The police stated that the Navy and the life guard rescue teams are conducting search operations in search of the missing youth.
